ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim
ygData.msgSnippet: It might be possible I know I can use Illusion Iksar in Felwithe and BBM and not use any faction spells and still be Apprehensive.  I am agnostic though so
ygData.messageBody:
It might be possible I know I can use Illusion Iksar in Felwithe and BBM and
not use any faction spells and still be Apprehensive. I am agnostic though
so your milage may vary.

Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 3:49 AM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim


I've started an iksar monk named Zainal....leve 14 (so close to double
damage)

And I've decided to have great faction with him with almost everyone...cept
the people who don't matter like the orcs.

And I was just wondering....does anyone know how to get better faction with
the merchants?

I'm currently killing everything in Crushbone (or will be when I make 15)
for faction with Storm Guards (dwarven guards in BB and Kaladim's warrior
guild)
Then I'll start turning in the pads/belts for faction. I don't think
this'll help with the merchants....any help?
